EmailTemplate.name: MSF Data Request (Individual Denial)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Markit Securities Finance Data Enquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent e-mail to us.
Unfortunately, due to the agreements that we have with our customers, we are not able to send any data to anyone who is not a contributor to our database.
Please see our Research and Analysis for publicly available information based on our data..
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
